article_title: Amid Investor And Political Pressure, Walgreen Faces Domicile Decision

article_metadata.description: Walgreen Co. (WAG), closing in on key deadlines in its three-year plan to acquire European drugstore giant Alliance Boots, said an inversion remains on the table that would relocate the iconic brand from the U.S. to take advantage of a loophole that allows them to avoid higher corporate taxes here. Walgreen [...]
article_metadata.author: Bruce Japsen
